thread.title: BRIEF-Jilin Aodong Pharmaceutical Group Says To Issue 2.4 Billion Yuan Convertible Bonds

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Jilin Aodong Pharmaceutical Group Says To Issue 2.4 Billion Yuan Convertible Bonds

organizations.name: reuters) - jilin aodong pharmaceutical group co ltd

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Jilin Aodong Pharmaceutical Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS TO ISSUE 2.4 BILLION YUAN ($378.75 million) CONVERTIBLE BONDS Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2DaqPsT Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3366 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
